author: andreas
msg: Don't copy passwd files to new publication. This fixes bug #40390.

author: dreid
msg: Keep Mads happy by making the committers list file compliant
with XHTML. Also add a footer telling people ;-)

author: olegk
msg: * Refactored HttpService to be more state-less. HttpService now takes HttpServerConnection and HttpContext as parameters to the #handleRequest method
* No more ugly logging methods in HttpService
* Fatal I/O and protocol exceptions are now propagated to the caller of the #handleRequest method

author: hughesj
msg: Removed createPropertyElement and createFeatureElement from DescriptionElement.
addPropertyElement and addFeatureElement on the ConfigurableImpl now does a
create then add. This means create and add is now an atomic action.

author: andreas
msg: Fix initUsecasePolicies stylesheet to work with new ac scheme. This fixes bug 40434. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for the patch.
